testCase.name: prepareData should return an empty array when no data is provided
prepareData should return the correct transformed data when all values are provided
prepareData should filter out elements with undefined values
prepareData should handle partial data correctly
getCharacters should return characters sorted by name in asc order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by name in desc order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by modified in asc order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by modified in desc order
getCharacterById should return the character with the given id
getCharacterById should throw an error if the character with the given id is not found
fetchCharacters should fetch characters sorted by name in asc order
fetchCharacters should fetch characters sorted by name in desc order
fetchCharacters should fetch characters sorted by modified in asc order
fetchCharacters should fetch characters sorted by modified in desc order
renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
renders the character detail correctly
does not render the character thumbnail image when not provided
renders "no character" when character is not provided
AboutPage sets the document title correctly
ContactPage sets the document title correctly
renders an empty list when no characters are provided
renders an empty list when characters is empty
renders the correct number of list items when characters are provided

CharactersPage render CharactersPage component
